"Hehe... I knew you'd come, <%me>.":
"Here, we may fight to our full potential.
This invincible field placed here will protect
the tower from our might."

"Do you understand?
Neither one of us need hold back..."

"You are unique, <%me>. From a single glance,
I could tell that you were the only one capable
of the breadth of my power."

"Neither prize nor reward await the victor;
only honor and achievement."

"From the time of Genesis, this body has been
refined. Can you feel it? The peak of this flesh
and blood."
